title: Scene from A Different World - Evaluate source

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one feature of the representations of African Americans on the stage or screen in the twentieth century.Explain how a historical context could have influenced the representations of African Americans, such as depicted in the source.Explain how depictions of African Americans in the performing arts could be useful sources for African American Studies scholars.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one feature of the representations of African Americans on the stage or screen in the twentieth century.Explain how a historical context could have influenced the representations of African Americans, such as depicted in the source.Explain how depictions of African Americans in the performing arts could be useful sources for African American Studies scholars.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
